khadabapasaba siddhiya sambandhawa parikshana kala komisama magin ramafosa nidos kota nidahas kalath deshapalana ka්riyakaruwo me siduwima sambandhawa nirantharayen ohuta dosharopanaya karathi. 2017 wasare mul bhagayedi ihatha siduwima sambandhawa thama nikuth kala pa්rakashaye, bhasha bhawithaya pilibandawa ohu samawa ayada siti athara ema pa්raharayedi jiwitha hani walakwima sandaha thama madihath wu bawa digin digatama kiya sitiyeya. 2012 wasaredi ramafosa nawatha deshapalanayata awathirna wana athara 2014 wasaredi dakunu apa්rikanu upajanadhipathi dhurayata pathwimath samanga noyekuth dushana ha rajya paripalana aka්ramikatha pilibanda chodana laba siti janadhipathi suma wenuwen sewaya kirimata ohuta siduwu athara indahita ee sambandhawa sara bala karana lada pa්rakasha karannata yeduni.
eeka ehemanam nuwara ahawalawa hoyanawa boru.

kiyana thaththwaya athi wima magin yam haniyak wennata puluwan kamak thibenawa , eeth kalin kiwase ikman niwaradi prathikarayakata yomu wunanam baya wenne nathiwa hitha sathutin inna ..patiyata karadarayak wena ekak naha ..ee wagema oba diyawadiyawa wage thaththwa nathnam oba prathishakthiya aduwana thaththwayaka innawa nam , ee kiwwe digu kalinawa stiroyid ganaye aushadha matha inna kenek nam , ehema nathnam pilika nashaka aushadha laba ganna kenek nam , ehemath nathnam wenath roga thaththwayak nisa obe prathishakthikarana hakiyawa adu bawa waidyawaraya obata pawasa athnam me leden parissam wenna balanna , hadisiye hari hadunoth bibilak dekak mathuwenakotama wage obe waidyawaraya hamuwela nisi prathikara ganna , ethakota bayawenna epa ..papol gedi halilama yawi ..
